catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 850
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: tall, round basket that tapers near top of body before flaring outward at mouth; chevron wave design with lighter band of three strips around center; handle made of three strips of bamboo with five decorative knots joining thm together at top; slight foot
signed: carved on bottom: 清月造之 {Seigetsu tsukuri kore} (Made by Seigetsu)
title: Tall basket with wide mouth and handle
